attributes.action: explain why the only solution to the Israel/Palestine problem is a 2 state solution as opposed to a single state.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely now the Palestinians realise they can't remove Israel, so why can't the solution be a combined Israel/Palestine with equal rights as citizens, albeit no right of return to old homes left in 1946, the Palestinians giving up their claim to the whole of Israel in return for equal status in Palestine alongside Israel as it now is, Israel and Palestine being 2 names for the same state. All other decisions to be decided by the Knessett elected after the merger.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
